ExportedFolder.Name: ZZ - Raid Buffs - Image & Text aura

Trigger.Name: Walking Dead
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<walkingdeadname>[a-zA-Z']+) [a-zA-Z']+ gains the effect of Walking Dead

Trigger.Name: Walking Dead Loss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<walkingdeadlossname>[a-zA-Z']+) [a-zA-Z']+ loses the effect of Walking Dead

Trigger.Name: Divine Veil
Trigger.RegularExpression: (1A|1E):[\w]+:(?<target>[\w-' ]+) (?<effect>(gains|loses)) the effect of Divine Veil from (?<caster>[\w-']+ [\w-']+)

Trigger.Name: Regen Tracker
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<name>[A-Za-z' -]+) gains the effect of Regen from (?<caster>[A-Za-z' -]+) for (?<time>..)(\...)? Seconds

Trigger.Name: AA - README - Raid Buffs Setup (Read Description)
Trigger.Description:
HOW TO SET THIS UP ?
1 - Make a folder in your Local Triggers, name it whatever you want.
2 - Copy&Paste the "AA Settings - Raid Buffs" trigger in that new folder
3 - Select said folder as a Startup Folder under : Options -> Edit Configuration -> General -> Startup Folder
4 - Edit the Actions in the"AA Settings" Trigger to place the starting image where you want, the rest will stay alligned
5 - YOU ARE DONE !!
Optional - Download and select Trick Attack sound file from DeadCatFish soundpack here : https://onedrive.live.com/?cid=8485af4f28fc460f&id=8485AF4F28FC460F%21248&authkey=%21ANLpmdeIRpsF%5FTk
